textBeforeTable: Employment estimate and mean wage estimates for this occupation: National estimates for this occupation: Top National estimates for this occupation Industry profile for this occupation State profile for this occupation Metropolitan area profile for this occupation Occupational Employment and Wages, May 2007 43-5051 Postal Service Clerks Perform any combination of tasks in a post office, such as receive letters and parcels; sell postage and revenue stamps, postal cards, and stamped envelopes; fill out and sell money orders; place mail in pigeon holes of mail rack or in bags according to State, address, or other scheme; and examine mail for correct postage.
